publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-397 Roseanna Cunningham: Adults with Incapacity (Scotland) Bill (Stage 2 order of consideration)—That the Justice and Home Affairs Committee consider the Adult with Incapacity (Scotland) Bill at Stage 2 in the following order: Parts 1 to 4, Parts 6 and 7, Part 5; and that each schedule is considered immediately after the section that introduces it.

S1M-397 Roseanna Cunningham: Adults with Incapacity (Scotland) Bill (Stage 2 order of consideration)—That the Justice and Home Affairs Committee consider the Adults with Incapacity (Scotland) Bill at Stage 2 in the following order: Parts 1 to 4, Parts 6 and 7, Part 5; and that each schedule is considered immediately after the section that introduces it.
S1M-397 Adults with Incapacity (Scotland) Bill (Stage 2 order of consideration) (lodged on 22 December 1999) Alasdair Morgan*, Robin Harper*, Angus MacKay*
